subject: Re: Re: Spring retainers
description_text:
Not sure if in the shuffle this got mixed in, I’m looking for help with
ticket #5257. I was supposed to be sent a replacement brake pedal however I
received a clutch pedal.

Not sure how the old email I sent with a question about springs got in here
but this isn’t my issue.

Ticket 5257. Was told a new brake pedal was being sent and I was actually
sent a clutch.
